mapper.select: SELECT * FROM client_department WHERE client_id = #{clientId} -- AND use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sort
SELECT e.* FROM client_user e LEFT JOIN client_department d ON e.department_id = d.id WHERE e.client_id = #{clientId} ORDER BY e.sort
SELECT cg.*, cgm.target, cgm.target_id, cgm.id as group_mapping_id FROM cmm_group_mapping cgm JOIN cmm_group cg ON cgm.group_id = cg.id WHERE target = 'E' AND target_id = #{userId}

with recursive cte (id, parent_department_key) as ( select id, parent_department_key from client_department where id = #{departmentId} union all select p.id, p.parent_department_key from client_department p inner join cte on p.department_key = cte.parent_department_key )
SELECT cg.*, cgm.target, cgm.target_id, cgm.id as group_mapping_id FROM cmm_group_mapping cgm JOIN cmm_group cg ON cgm.group_id = cg.id WHERE target = 'D' AND target_id IN ( SELECT id FROM cte )
